text: Andrew Austen Luck (born September 12, 1989) is an Former American football quarterback who played for the Indianapolis Colts of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football for Stanford University. He was also the first person taken in the 2012 NFL Draft by the Colts. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Washington, D.C. Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Indianapolis Colts players
title: Andrew Luck
